description: Enumerates all local Windows user accounts, including usernames, full names, status (enabled/disabled), password policies, last logon, account expiration, and group memberships. Outputs NDJSON (one record per user) and writes atomically to the Active Response log with .new fallback.

script_parameters.name: LogPath
script_parameters.description: Path to the rotating human-readable script log.

script_parameters.name: ARLog
script_parameters.description: Active Response NDJSON output path (atomic overwrite; falls back to .new if locked).
